alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:10PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong outflow winds will impact portions of south central Newberry, central Lexington, northern Aiken, southeastern Saluda and central Richland Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was detecting strong outflow winds along a line extending from 9 miles west of Dreher Island State Park to Lake Carolina. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Irmo, Forest Acres, Batesburg-Leesville, Springdale, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Oak Grove, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Red Bank, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Arcadia Lakes, Columbia International University, Harbison State Forest, Sesquicentennial State Park and Lake Carolina. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 0 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 40 and 84. Interstate 26 between mile markers 96 and 117. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
